Name: Sian Williams
Job/Team Function: Reporting to the Director, key policy areas include governance and DCMS relations, and responsibility for the financial management of the Museum, operations of the Finance and Procurement departments, Human Resources, Information System Services, and the Directorate's administrative and planning teams.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: Martin Roth
Job/Team Function: Reporting to the Board of Trustees, responsible for the achievement of the Museum's objectives.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: Beth McKillop
Job/Team Function: Reporting to the Director of the Museum. Also takes senior responsibility at Director level for Collections and Learning. Key policy areas include collections strategy, expertise and knowledge, research, cultural policy, Exhibition Road project, UK and international strategy.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: Moira Gemmill
Job Title: Director of Projects, Design and Estate
Job/Team Function: Reporting to the Director of the Museum, responsible for the operations of the Projects, Design, Estate and Collections Services departments. Key policy areas include FuturePlan, the V&A's long-term programme of renewal and restoration; design standards for the V&A across all media both internally and externally; and operations of the collections services teams.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: Damien Whitmore
Job/Team Function: Reporting to the Director of the Museum, responsible for the operations of the Publics Affairs Division, which consists of Press, Marketing, Exhibitions and Loans, Online Museum. Key policy areas include visitor experience, V&A brand, V&A website, Staff Engagement Programme, diversity strategy, media relations and the public programme.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
